title: Samples, ca. 1910
dimensions:
a. Warp: 17.5 cm [7"] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 87 cm [34 1/4"] Selvedge left side, cut other side.
b. Warp: 22 cm [8.5] Cut top and bottom.
    Weft: 28 cm [11"] Selvedge right side, cut other side.
creditline: Gift of Margaret and Teresa Gloster in memory of Mary and Margaret McElligott
description:
a. Rust color ground with white and lighter rust/orange flowers and ribbons.
b. Pink/orange ground with white and yellow flowers and ribbons.
